sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export default function CardVehicles({title,info}){ const film = useSelector((state) => state.films) return (

{title ? title : null}

{info ?

Model:

{info.model}

Manufacturer:

{info.model}

Cost in credits:

{info.cost_in_credits}

Length:

{info.length}

Max atmosphering speed:

{info.max_atmosphering_speed}

Crew:

{info.crew}

Passengers:

{info.passengers}

Cargo capacity:

{info.cargo_capacity}

Consumables:

{info.consumables}

Vehicle class:

{info.vehicle_class}

Films : {info.films.map(f => film.results[Number(f.substr(-2,1))-1].title+', ')}

:

Cargando

}
) }
